revision:
Areas of combinations of circles and plane figures

  1. Area of a rectangle = \(Length \times breadth\)
  2. All sides of a square are equal, so area of a square=\(side \times side=side^2\)
  3. Area of a triangle=\(\frac 12 \times (base) \times (height)\)
  4. Area of a semi-circle=\(\frac 12 \times [\pi \times r^2]\)
